MESSAGE.functions: <@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A procCrash trap signifies that a process managed by PM has crashed and left a core file><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A procExit trap signifies that a process managed by PM has exited unexpectedly, but not left a core file><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The average CPU utilization in the past minute has gone above the acceptable threshold><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The system has been paging excessively><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:This alarm is deprecated>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Detected a peer with a mismatched software version><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The appliance has entered bypass (failthru) mode><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:An error has been generated by the RAID array><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The data store is corrupted><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Admission control memory alarm has been triggered><@disposition:Admission Control>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Admission control connections alarm has been triggered><@disposition:Admission Control>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The service is halted due to a software error><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:There has been a service error. Please consult the log file><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A scheduled job has failed during execution><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A user has entered configuration mode><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A user has exited configuration mode><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:An interface on the appliance has lost its link><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:NFS v2/v4 alarm notification><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A power supply on the appliance has failed><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Asymmetric routes have been detected, certain connections might not have been optimized because of this><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A fan has failed on this appliance><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A memory error has been detected on the appliance><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:An IPMI event has been detected on the appliance. Please check the details in the alarm report on the Web UI><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A change has been made to the system configuration><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The datastore has wrapped around><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The system temperature has exceeded the threshold><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The system temperature has reached a critical stage><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Unable to establish connection with the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Connection lost since end of stream was received from the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Connection lost due to an error communicating with the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Connection lost due to lack of keep-alives from the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Connection lost due to lack of ACKs from the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Timeout reading info from the specified neighbor><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Connection forwarding latency with the specified neighbor has exceeded the threshold><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:There is an error in the automatic reenrollment of the SSL peering certificate><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:CRL polling fails><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Data store sync has failed><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:SSL acceleration and the secure data store cannot be used until the secure vault has been unlocked><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:If you wish to use a nondefault password for the secure vault, the password must be rekeyed><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:An error was detected while initializing the secure vault><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The current appliance configuration has been saved><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A TCP dump has been started><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A TCP dump has been scheduled><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A new user has been created><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Disk error has been detected><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Accumulated SSD write cycles passed predefined level><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A user has just logged-in via CLI><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A CLI user has just logged-out><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A user has just logged-in via the Web UI><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A user has just logged-out via the Web UI><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Trap Test><@disposition:Healthy>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Optimization service is experiencing high CPU utilization><@disposition:Admission Control>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Optimization service is experiencing high TCP memory pressure><@disposition:Admission Control>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:One or more system partitions is full or almost full><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:An attempt to join a domain failed><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Some x509 certificates may be expiring><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:The main Steelhead license has expired, been removed, or become invalid><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Hardware error detected><@disposition:Either Critical or Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Error is found in System Detail Report><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:New MAPI connections will be passed through due to high connection count><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Serial cascade misconfiguration has been detected><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Flash hardware error detected><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:LAN-WAN loop detected. System will not optimize new connections until this error is cleared><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Optimization service currently not optimizing any connections><@disposition:Critical>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Upgrade failed and the system is running the previous image><@disposition:Needs attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:One or more licensed features will expire within the next two weeks><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:One or more licensed features have expired><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:A cluster Steelhead has been reported as disconnected><@disposition:Degraded>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Domain authentication alert><@disposition:Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:Storage profile switch failed><@disposition:Either Critical or Needs Attention>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@fld10:*EVNTTIME($MSG,'%B %F %H:%U:%S %W',fld11)>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@fld10:*EVNTTIME($MSG,'%B %F %H:%U:%S %W',fld11)>
<@dclass_counter1_string:Total Connections><@dclass_counter2_string:Branched Warmed Connections><@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> Connection limit achieved. Total Connections <dclass_counter1>,Branched Warmed Connections <dclass_counter2>

MESSAGE.functions: <@dclass_counter1_string:Memory Usage><@dclass_counter2_string:Current Connections><@dclass_counter3_string:TCP Memory Usage><@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> Memory Usage: <dclass_counter1> Current Connections: <dclass_counter2> TCP Memory Usage: <dclass_counter3>;
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> Resetting state for oob splice: laddr=<saddr>:<sport> raddr=<daddr>:<dport> cflag=<fld5>
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> Connect result for client <daddr>:<dport> server <saddr>:<sport> cfe <fld1> sfe <fld2>: <disposition>
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> Lost OOB Splice between laddr=<saddr>:<sport> and raddr=<daddr>:<dport>
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> {{<daddr>:<dport> <saddr>:<sport>} Err while reading: Connection reset by peer
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> {{<fld4> <fld5>} (clnt: <daddr>:<dport> peer: <hostip>:<network_port> serv: <saddr>:<sport>) Error connecting to peer OOB
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> <fld4> <fld5> (clnt: <daddr>:<dport> peer: <hostip>:<network_port> serv: <saddr>:<sport>) No outer channel created for this splice

MESSAGE.functions: <@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_time:*EVNTTIME($HDR,'%B %F %H:%U:%O',hmonth,hdate,htime)><@event_description:No replication credentials>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_time:*EVNTTIME($HDR,'%B %F %H:%U:%O',hmonth,hdate,htime)><@event_description:Error getting key for server>
<@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_time:*EVNTTIME($HDR,'%B %F %H:%U:%O',hmonth,hdate,htime)><@event_description:Unable to obtain usk: The replication credentials could not be found>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>] <fld3> {{<daddr>:<dport> <saddr>:<sport>} Unable to obtain usk: The replication credentials could not be found. (<result>)

MESSAGE.functions: <@dclass_counter1_string:session count><@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@ec_subject:User><@ec_activity:Logon><@ec_theme:Authentication><@ec_outcome:Success>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>]: <fld1>: User <username> logged in from <saddr>, session count: <dclass_counter1>.

MESSAGE.functions: <@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@fld10:*EVNTTIME($MSG,'%B %F %H:%U:%S %W',fld11)><@ec_subject:User><@ec_activity:Logoff><@ec_theme:Authentication>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>]: <fld1>: Invalidating active session for <username>, logged in from <saddr>, idle since <fld10> <fld11>
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>]: <fld1>: Expiring invalidated session for <username>, logged in from <saddr>
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>]: <fld1>: <fld2>: Deleting expired session for <username>, logged in from <saddr>.
<agent>[<process_id>]: [<application>.<severity>]: <fld1>: User <username> with the given password is not recognized: <info>.

MESSAGE.functions: <@ec_theme:Authentication><@ec_subject:User><@ec_activity:Logon><@ec_outcome:Failure><@:*SYSVAL($MSGID,$ID1)><@msg:*PARMVAL($MSG)><@event_description:authentication failure>
MESSAGE.content: <agent>(<application>)[<process_id>]: authentication failure; logname=<fld1> uid=<uid> euid=<fld3> tty=<fld8> ruser=<c_username> rhost=<shost> user=<username>
